original_title: Where can I buy a mask?
overview: WHERE CAN I BUY A MASK is a song to record the phenomena of bulk purchasing surgical masks appeared in January 2020 in Hong Kong which caused by the panic from the outbreak of Wuhan Pneumonia. Panicked people are purchasing surgical masks in different countries ( Japan, Korea, Hong Kong, China, Taiwan etc ) as precautions of the epidemic, and scalpers purchase the products for profit as usual, folks who can not afford a higher price can do nothing about them.
title: Where can I buy a mask?
